reviews.review: Just saw this recently. Really good movie, did not disappoint. I love how the “good guys” don’t win this one, I think the Marvel universe needed some of that. I wouldn’t bring your small children tho, the ending is likely to highly upset them.
Not just a fantastic super hero film but a damn good block buster
AMAZING ABSOULUTELY AMAZING. ALSO REALLY FUNNY BUT EMOTIONAL, MOVING AND POWERFULLY SAD.

Ignore all mixed reviews. As a fan for 10 years of the MCU this film gives you everything you want and more. Yes it's non stop, but it's a great way of humanising what happens. Life doesn't give you short breaks so you can absorb it. And that's a great way of showing you that the characters need to deal with the biggest threat ever seen so far.

The build for this film is totally justified and will drag you in to happy, sad, heart wrenching moments and literal one after the other. I laughed so much and was also brought to a tear and it's all because of how marvel has made you love and care for the characters. 

This film is huge. HUGE. It's the next day and I can not stop thinking about it. My only wish is that they released this and avengers 4 within a month of each other because this wait is going to be a tough one. 

10/10 from an MCU fan and just flat out enjoys what marvel do.

I've seen all the films leading up to this and this one didn't disappoint. I was on the edge of my seat from start to finish the amount of characters on screen is truly epic and they all play there part in this action packed banazza. a must see stop what your doing and go see it. the best film this year I be going again. story is played out so well I could go on and on this film is second to none.
Amazing culmination of ALL the MCU flicks! Non-stop action from beginning to end

What a ride that takes you all over the marvel universe giving purpose to the last 10 years of films. Some surprise appearances and deaths I didn't see coming. This is a beautifully constructed film with the right amount emotion, fun, action and suspense. Bravo and bring on the next part next year...

Never before has a villain been treated with such respectful craftsmanship. He is perfect.His motive is relatable.. his conviction to what he sees as the only way to save life in the universe is powerful and leads to incredible emotional scenes. 11/10 would bang :)
Fantastic film!. One of the best films in the MCU at the moment!.
No spoilers, just see this movie. be prepared to know that watching all 18 previous movies helps a lot and gives this film the weight it needs and deserves.
